comment_body:
any reasons about the kernel upgrade?
what're the features we want

check this PR. https://github.com/Azure/sonic-linux-kernel/pull/32

Instead of pulling the a specific commit, I think it is better to upgrade the kernel image to include latest security bug fixes.

This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. We will now review your pull request.

can you update the sonic-linux-kernel submodule in the sonic-buildimage repo so that your kernel patches is included in the image?

@__VitalyVovnoboy__,
Thanks for your contribution.
To ensure that the project team has proper rights to use your work, please complete the Contribution License Agreement at https://cla.microsoft.com.

It will cover your contributions to all Microsoft-managed open source projects.

I am not sure if this patch is really needed. tun_set_iff will bring the carrier on. 

http://elixir.free-electrons.com/linux/v3.16.44/source/drivers/net/tun.c#L1696

The tun_set_iff is called when tun device is created and the device is running by default without possibility of stopping it.
We need option of setting "Running" status according to port link by controlling carrier enable/disable state.
